attributes.action: demand the resignation of the Home Secretary, Jacqui Smith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Secretary has failed to honour the Police Arbitration Tribunal pay recommendations of 2.5% pay rise from September 1st. This has meant a REAL pay rise of 1.9% starting in December.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
